content.4: And Mesha king of Moab was a sheepmaster, and rendered unto the king of Israel an hundred thousand lambs, and an hundred thousand rams, with the wool.
content.5: But it came to pass, when Ahab was dead, that the king of Moab rebelled against the king of Israel.
content.6: And king Jehoram went out of Samaria the same time, and numbered all Israel.
